miniapp.name: WordCast
miniapp.subtitle: Daily word puzzle with blockchain scores
miniapp.description: Play daily Wordle-style word puzzles, compete on global leaderboards, earn points with strategic guessing, and save your scores to the blockchain. Track your streak and challenge friends!
miniapp.tagline: Guess the word, climb the leaderboard.
miniapp.ogDescription: Play daily word puzzles, compete on leaderboards, and save scores to blockchain.
